lines: 304LOMBA BBUKU LISOLOLELAASK FOR THE GUIDE BOOK
Kuti wayanda kumvwa kasimpe, Lomba Bbuku elyo litelele.
Lomba Bbuku lisololela benzu, Kolibala mumusinzo wako;
Lomba Bbuku kolibala bunene, Bala mazuba onse.
Utamvwi ibayanda kulesya, Utateeleli benzyi bambi;
Kolomba Bbuku lil Ôakasimpe, Waliteelela uya kusika.
Zyuulu zyeenda nzila ya kufwa, Basyonto ibeenda iluleme;
Imwi nimbotu, imwi mudima, Imwi ililuleme, imwi pee.
